description:
Yes, you can easily use multiple music in the same video. All you need to do is add  a group of photos to the first section and then click the button 'Add Another Music'. Select a desired audio and add the content to be played under that music. And follow the same sequence thereafter.



PS: If you do not add content (photos/text) to this extra audio, it will not be played in your video.
description_text: Yes, you can easily use multiple music in the same video. All you need to do is add  a group of photos to the first section and then click the button 'Add Another Music'. Select a desired audio and add the content to be played under that music. And follow the same sequence thereafter.         PS: If you do not add content (photos/text) to this extra audio, it will not be played in your video.
title: Can I use more than one sound track ?
